features: Recommended Use: For infants up to 50 lbs. | Included car seat adapter fits the following car seats (car seats sold separately): Graco SnugRide Click Connect Evenflo Nurture; Evenflo Embrace Britax B-Safe 35 Chicco KeyFit 30
Compact Fold: Quick release back tires create a compact fold that makes it great for small cars with limited cargo space | Comfy Seat: Reclining seat with multiple positions and swing away child tray

Adjustable Handlebar: Leather wrapped handlebar with multiple positions to accommodate parents of all heights | Tons of Storage: Large basket and parent fabric organizer with 2 cup holders and phone storage provides space for all your essentials

Oversized Canopy: Neoprene canopy is water resistant and has pop out UPF 50 plus sun visor | Peek-a-boo window for easy interaction with baby | Smooth Ride: Back 16" wheels with suspension system smooths out bumps | Swivel front 12" wheel for ultimate control

SAFE OPTION: JPMA certified ; 5-point safety harnesses ; Reflective shoulder pads ; Recommended for ages 9 months up to 35 lbs. per seat (70 lbs. total) ; Assembled dimensions: 35.2”L x 29.4”W x 41.5”H
body.description: With the Jeep Hydro Sport Plus Jogger by Delta Children you and your baby can go the distance! A versatile jogging stroller, it delivers the best running experience with its swivel front wheel and back-wheel suspension that smooths out the bumps to provide a comfortable ride for your little one. The oversized and adjustable neoprene canopy with pop out UPF 50+ sun protection is water-repellant and features a peek-a-boo window that lets you keep an eye on your child as you run or walk. For your child's comfort, the reclining seat and swing away child tray allow little ones to happily nap or snack. You'll love the adjustable handlebar that's wrapped in leather and features multiple height positions, as well as the large storage basket and parent fabric organizer with 2 cup holders and covered storage to keep your keys or phone within easy reach. Quick release back tires create a compact fold that makes it great for small cars with limited cargo space. Recommended use: Infants up to 50 lbs. For added convenience, convert this jogger into a travel system with the included car seat adapter. Included car seat adapter fits the following car seats (car seats sold separately): Graco SnugRide Click Connect Evenflo Nurture; Evenflo Embrace Britax B-Safe 35 Chicco KeyFit 30 Since 1941, the Jeep brand has been a symbol of freedom and expression. Influenced by a love of the great outdoors, Jeep kids' products are created for little adventurers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Jogging
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is great for jogging/running and walking! Assembly was easy (you hardly have to follow the instructions). My Graco car seat fits nicely with the attachment (the tray). The ride is very smooth, the front wheel locks, the handle bar is adjustable, and the stroller is lightweight. So far, I've enjoyed all of my runs using this stroller. (I've only taken it on paved roads - unsure how it handles off-road). Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO HAPPY WITH THIS STROLLER!
reviews.reviewText: For years we had a crappy regular stroller that felt every bump and struggled to go on any terrain other than smooth roads.....so glad I chose this stroller! It's so smooth and comfortable. The seat is comfortable for my 18 month old and allows her to sit upright enough to see while the canopy provides a great amount of coverage to protect against the sun. The tires are huge and sturdy, and yet it's soooo easy to fold up and fits in the trunk of my nissan sedan no problem! It is heavier than non jogging strollers but I'm 5'2" and I don't struggle with it at all. I haven't used it while jogging yet but using it I'm confident it would work great! You will not find another stroller at this price that's better. If you're endlessly searching thru reviews and comparing strollers and keep coming back to this one (like I did) just get it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Maybe the best stroller ever...?
reviews.reviewText: My wife and I both love this stroller. She was given several different strollers by her siblings, friends, etc, and none has been as robust as this one; in fact we've passed most of them along while holding onto this one.I like it because the handle is adjustable up/down and even though I'm very tall (6'-8" w/ 38" inseam), my hands rest comfortably on the handle when it is adjusted up. I also like it because we live on acreage and this buggy is able to cruise over mowed grass fields and gravel driveways effortlessly... gravel doesn't even cause it to vibrate and bounce around as some of our other strollers do. I really wanted to find a buggy with some sort of suspension system built in, but when I was unsuccessful in finding what I wanted, I purchased this model, and as it turns out, it functions just as well as I would have hoped, even without any sort of visible suspension. It really is impressive how smooth it is on our gravel driveway.Weaknesses include the fact it does not fold up very flat... at all. When folded, it would fit nicely in a box with dimensions 3' x 3' x 2'. It is also somewhat difficult to fold, relative to some other strollers we've had. By difficult I don't mean hard, but it's not intuitive... I had to study it for a few minutes to figure out how to do it, and some might describe me as mechanically inclined. It is also not the lightest, but it's not unreasonably heavy; weight is the price paid for the nice, large, pneumatic tires which are the reason it rolls so nicely over rough terrain. I can't comment on the car seat adapter, as we don't use it. The sun shade is nice, as is the peek-through window in the sun shade. Finally, and probably the most important, our daughter (14 mo now) doesn't mind it at all, and maybe even enjoys being strapped into it :)All in all, I would recommend this buggy for anyone, as long as you have a second, smaller buggy to keep in the car for those days when you're in and out of the car a lot. This buggy is easy to live with as long as you don't have to pack it in and out a bunch, and the smooth, quiet ride and nice ergonomics for both adult and baby are worth the extra hassle to fold it and stow it if you're going somewhere and you're planning to stay a while (zoo, mall, etc).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for walks!
reviews.reviewText: Got this so I could walk on the rural terrain with my baby. The adapter made it easy to place my car seat onto the stroller. The stroller is easy to assemble & handles great. Cannot wait to use it regularly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great stroller with some limitations.
reviews.reviewText: This stroller has a nice smooth ride. It folds and unfolds easily, but it's a two handed job. Not what I would call light weight. Main complaint is that the back does not allow the child to fully sit up. Looks great and is well constructed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this stroller
reviews.reviewText: Seriously an incredible stroller. It’s easy to fold and store. It’s light weight. The tires are so easy to take off and put on. It’s a bit on the larger size but it’s glides so effortlessly. Great taking on gravel or light terrain. Comparable with several car seats and so easy to put the car seat in and take it out. This is a stroller that you’ll keep as your baby grows. I needed a stroller so I could go on long walks/run with baby and this is a must! Has cup holders and an undercarriage part to store things. If you’re a running/walker… GET THIS :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and sturdy, practical. Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing is awesome for going through grass, on trails, even in light amounts of sand. It’s super comfy and easy to clean. My daughter loves it and so do I.
La mejor carriola que pudimos haber elegido. Tiene excelentes llantas cumple con todas las expectativas que teníamos.
